text: Yuan is a fictional character created by Bruce Lee for the film The Game of Death. He is a Gang member fighter. Character of The Game of Death Series ordinal actor name character Year Subcategories from the storyline of The Game of Death 1 Sung-woo Park Yuan 2001 from 1972 archive footage 2 Chieh Yuan / 1972 == Chieh Yuan in The Game of Death == Is a fictional character created by Bruce Lee for the film The Game of Death, which was released in 1972. He was portrayed by Hong Kong actor Chieh Yuan and serves as the main fighter of the film. == Prequel == === Yuan (The Story) === Yuan is a fictional character for the film The Story, which was released in 2001. He was portrayed by Korean actor Sung-woo Park. == Related pages== * Tien (The Game of Death) * Gang == Other websites == * Yuan (The Game of Death) on IMDb Category:The Game of Death characters
title: Yuan (The Game of Death)
